titleStmt.title: By the King, a proclamation recalling former proclamations prohibiting trade into the Canary Islands
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1660-1685 : Charles II)
Charles II, King of England, 1630-1685.

notesStmt.note: "Given at our court at Whitehall the 27th day of September, 1667."
